readme_content:
![header](./headergithub.png) ## 💫 About Me: Namasthe! 🙏
I'm Sathvik Pasuvula, currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science at Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham and a B.S in Data Science and Applications from IIT Madras (hybrid).
Beyond code, I’m all about exploring DevOps and contributing to FOSS projects, with active involvement in communities like MLH and Wikimedia Foundation. I follow a “Learn In Public” philosophy—it’s a game changer for growth and connecting with others in tech!
Along the way, I’ve picked up solid networking skills, earning me the nickname “Point of View Pro” among friends because I’m always up for hearing diverse perspectives. I’m also a movie geek at heart, with a soft spot for classic evergreen films and old-school tunes 🤌
Feel free to reach out for a chat about Open Source stuff, Web Development, DevOps or even just movies! 😁

- 🔭 Right now, I’m diving into contributions for **Wikimedia** and **Indic Wiki projects**, tackling tasks on Phabricator and loving the challenge! - 🌱 I’m currently learning **Full-Stack Web Development** - 👨‍💻 All of my projects are available at [https://github.com/sathvik9105](https://github.com/sathvik9105) - 📫 How to reach me **sathvikpworks@gmail.com** - ⚡ Fun fact **On a mission to save the world—one pull request at a time! 🌐** ## 🌐 Socials:

## 💻 Tech Stack:

## 📊 GitHub Stats:

sathvik9105/OpenVision.summary: The OpenVision repository by sathvik9105 has recently seen significant activity. Two major updates were made: an update to README.md on February 18, 2025, and creation of the project's LICENSE on January 30, 2025.

profile_summary:
Here's a concise, SEO-optimized summary that highlights Sathvik's core technical skills and expertise:

As a programming enthusiast and B.Tech in Computer Science & B.S in Data Science and Applications from IIT Madras, I leverage my expertise in Python, JavaScript, and HTML to drive innovation in web development, DevOps, and open-source projects. With a strong network of 4 followers and 17 public repositories, I'm committed to exploring new technologies like Full-Stack Web Development, contributing to Wikimedia and Indic Wiki projects, and spreading the "Learn In Public" philosophy to foster growth and collaboration in tech. Reach out via sathvikpworks@gmail.com for a chat on open-source, web development, or DevOps.
